decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in its own right and not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
1. Kitchen window dimension reduced to be consistent with living room at 1.6mx1m.
2. Side extension,downstairs toilet and utility rooms windows at minimal dimension requirements.
3. Side extension room window to front of house, to keep this consistent with neighbours and houses in the area and reduce downstairs toilet to minimal requirement of 1.3mx0.7m.
4. Downstairs toilet window to the side near the entrance door due to the front of the house is the location of the gas and electrical meters.
6. Add an EV charge point in front of the house.

The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and annotated on drawing numbers RC- A1- SB- 07 and RC- A1- SB- 08 and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings. Furthermore this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P0823.24.
description:
Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P0823.24 dated 06/08/2024 to allow for: 
- Kitchen window dimension reduced to be consistent with living room at 1.6mx1m.
- One skylight or two at varied dimensions.
- Side extension,downstairs toilet and utility rooms windows at minimal dimension requirements.
- Side extension room window to front of house, to keep this consistent with neighbours and houses in the area and reduce downstairs toilet to minimal requirement of 1.3mx0.7m.
- Downstairs toilet window to the side near the entrance door due to the front of the house is the location of the gas and electrical meters.
- No modification of front of house roof, therefore skylights not required, with dorma window providing sufficient light into room.
- Add an EV charge point in front of the house. (Single storey side and rear extension)
